mainSequence.step: User lists passage between 2 buildings
UI displays the list passage between 2 buildings component
UI requests building data from BuildingServiceFE
BuildingServiceFE retrieves a list of buildings from BuildingController
BuildingController fetches all buildings from BuildingServiceBE
BuildingServiceBE queries the database to get the buildings
BuildingServiceBE receives the list of buildings from the database
BuildingServiceBE sends the list of buildings to BuildingController
BuildingController responds with the list of buildings to BuildingServiceFE
BuildingServiceFE logs the buildings into the console
List of buildings is displayed on the UI
User asks for passage between 2 buildings
User selects 2 buildings
UI triggers the ListPassageBetween2Buildings function
ListPassageBetween2Buildings method lists floors from the selected buildings
ListPassageBetween2Buildings checks for passage availability
FloorController retrieves passage information from FloorServiceBE
FloorServiceBE queries the database for passage information
FloorServiceBE receives the passage information from the database
Passage information is sent back to FloorController
FloorController provides the passage information to FloorServiceFE
FloorServiceFE processes the information and displays the passage on the UI
